Name: Shit Storm
About the game: Your butt is lost in space. Prepare to take a GIANT dump in order to gain enough money to unlock dumb new costumes. Dodge enemies and consume foods in order to survive but watch out because in space no one can hear you shit. Check Out One Of Our Games!
